  <Sequence sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_1">
    <Sequence.Variables>
      <Variable x:TypeArguments="scg:Dictionary(x:String, sd:DataRowView)" Name="equityDict" />
      <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Name="accKey" />
      <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Name="equityKey" />
    </Sequence.Variables>
    <If Condition="[dtResultStructure Is Nothing]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="If_1">
      <If.Then>
        <Assign sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_1">
          <Assign.To>
            <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataTable">[dtResultStructure]</OutArgument>
          </Assign.To>
          <Assign.Value>
            <InArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataTable">[New DataTable()]</InArgument>
          </Assign.Value>
        </Assign>
      </If.Then>
    </If>
    <Assign sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_2">
      <Assign.To>
        <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataTable">[dtOutput]</OutArgument>
      </Assign.To>
      <Assign.Value>
        <InArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataTable">[dtResultStructure.Clone()]</InArgument>
      </Assign.Value>
    </Assign>
    <Assign sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_3">
      <Assign.To>
        <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="scg:Dictionary(x:String, sd:DataRowView)">[equityDict]</OutArgument>
      </Assign.To>
      <Assign.Value>
        <InArgument x:TypeArguments="scg:Dictionary(x:String, sd:DataRowView)">[New Dictionary(Of String, System.Data.DataRowView)]</InArgument>
      </Assign.Value>
    </Assign>
    <oa:ForEachDataRow DataView="{x:Null}" DataTable="[dtAcc]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="ForEachDataRow_1">
      <oa:ForEachDataRow.Variables>
        <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Int32" Default="0" Name="Index" />
        <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Int32" Default="0" Name="Total" />
        <Variable x:TypeArguments="sd:DataRowView" Name="aRow" />
        <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Name="sRow" />
      </oa:ForEachDataRow.Variables>
      <ActivityAction x:TypeArguments="sd:DataRowView">

        </ActivityAction.Argument>
        <Sequence sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_3">

            </Assign.To>
            <Assign.Value>
              <InArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">[aRow("Household_ID").ToString.Trim.ToUpper]</InArgument>
            </Assign.Value>
          </Assign>
          <If Condition="[Not equityDict.ContainsKey(accKey)]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="If_2">
            <If.Then>
              <InvokeMethod sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="InvokeMethod_1" MethodName="Add">
                <InvokeMethod.TargetObject>
                  <InArgument x:TypeArguments="scg:Dictionary(x:String, sd:DataRowView)">[equityDict]</InArgument>
                </InvokeMethod.TargetObject>
                <InArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">[accKey]</InArgument>
                <InArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataRowView">[aRow]</InArgument>
              </InvokeMethod>
            </If.Then>
          </If>
        </Sequence>
      </ActivityAction>
    </oa:ForEachDataRow>
    <oa:ForEachDataRow DataView="{x:Null}" DataTable="[dtEquity]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="ForEachDataRow_2">
      <oa:ForEachDataRow.Variables>
        <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Int32" Default="0" Name="Index" />
        <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Int32" Default="0" Name="Total" />
        <Variable x:TypeArguments="sd:DataRowView" Name="aRow" />
        <Variable x:TypeArguments="sd:DataRowView" Name="sRow" />
      </oa:ForEachDataRow.Variables>
      <ActivityAction x:TypeArguments="sd:DataRowView">
        <ActivityAction.Argument>
          <DelegateInArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataRowView" Name="sRow" />
        </ActivityAction.Argument>
        <Sequence sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_4">
          <Assign sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_5">
            <Assign.To>
              <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">[equityKey]</OutArgument>
            </Assign.To>
            <Assign.Value>
              <InArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">[sRow("Household_ID").ToString.Trim.ToUpper]</InArgument>
            </Assign.Value>
          </Assign>
          <If Condition="[equityDict.ContainsKey(equityKey)]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="If_3">
            <If.Then>
              <Sequence sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_2">
                <ou:AddDataRow DataTable="[dtOutput]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="AddDataRow_1" RowData="[{
 sRow("County_Name"),
 sRow("Constituency_Name"),
 sRow("Household_ID"),
 sRow("HHMember_Roster_ID"),
 equityDict(sRow("Household_ID").ToString.Trim.ToUpper)("First_name") 
}]" />
              </Sequence>
            </If.Then>
          </If>
        </Sequence>
      </ActivityAction>
    </oa:ForEachDataRow>
